text: 5.10: Mt 5.12; Hi 11.35Nde na phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi, nde mba Fhe Bakɨmen kamthooŋ gumgi, mbe fhum Guma Bakɨme zɨ bun suaŋgi. Mbe maaŋ mbuim, mben pana gumgi panan, mbe kav tɨvi mbatɨgir mbe mbuim, mbe wari won ndavi havhargiap, mbarara kav, mba simtɨgi ndigi. Nde mbe muuŋgi tɨvara muuŋv, mben tɨvara zɨn ŋgɨri.
